title: Is it wrong that I go to college and never meet my girlfriend? - Quora

response.answer_text: My friend, some people meet the person they want to be with when they are three. Others find love at sixty. Do yourself a favor and don’t worry about it. Be you, work on you and making yourself confident in your own skin. Trust me on this one; I’ve wasted a lot of time blindly flailing around looking for my one and it doesn’t work that way. Just wait patiently, meet new people, and the universe will provide.
Well, can’t you meet her other times or just at weekends? no its not wrong, its your life and your education which is important. Don’t drop it all just for some girl
